aka: The Closing Down of the Renault Factory at Vilvoorde Belgium - The Sexual Life of the Belgians - Part 3
this_title: Fermeture de l'usine Renault à Vilvoorde
trans_title: 比利时维尔福德的雷诺工厂的关闭
The Closing Down of the Renault Factory at Vilvoorde Belgium - The Sexual Life of the Belgians - Part 3
introduction: The Renault factory in Belgium must close down. Nobody can believe it. We follow the investigations by the director who is at the heart of the action and who interviews main politicians, the workers who violently protest and the direction. In the fiction part the president-director of Renault, Schweitzer is killed by one of the workers.
chinese_title: 比利时维尔福德的雷诺工厂的关闭
foreign_title: Fermeture de l'usine Renault à Vilvoorde
